name: first-child
title: :first-child Selector
desc: Selects all elements that are the first child of their parent.

examples.desc: Finds the first span in each matched div to underline and add a hover state.

entries.longdesc: While :first matches only a single element, the :first-child selector can match more than one: one for each parent. This is equivalent to :nth-child(1).
